nodes.documentation:
@title Restricts trading by a set volume per period (daily, monthly, yearly)
 @author Civic Ledger
nodes.name: VolumeRestriction
addMaxVolume
addMaxVolumeWithCustomYear
maxVolumeByKey
incrementCurrentVolume
currentVolumeByKey
canTrade

nodes.documentation:
@title Restricts trading by a set volume per period (daily, monthly, yearly)
 @author Civic Ledger
nodes.name: VolumeRestriction
addMaxVolume
addMaxVolumeWithCustomYear
maxVolumeByKey
incrementCurrentVolume
currentVolumeByKey
canTrade

devdoc.author: Civic Ledger

addMaxVolume(bytes32,uint256,uint8).details: Adds a volume restriction (with default calendar year)

params.keyHash: Key hash of the thing to be restricted
params.maxVolume: maxVolume Maximum trade volume per period
params.periodType: Period type id - PerDay, PerMonth, PerYear

addMaxVolumeWithCustomYear(bytes32,uint2.details: Adds a volume restriction (with custom calendar, i.e financial year)

params.keyHash: Key hash of the restricted thing, to retrieve restriction details
params.periodType: Period type id - PerDay, PerMonth, PerYear

canTrade(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Can they trade up to a specified volume

params.keyHash: Key hash of the volume restricted thing
params.onDate: Specified date on which to check

canTrade(bytes32,uint256,uint256).return: True if they are within their volume limits, False if they have exceeded their volume limits

currentVolumeByKey(bytes32,uint256).details: Retrieves a current trading volume by its key hash

params.keyHash: Key hash of the restricted thing to retrieve volume restriction details about
params.onDate: Specified date on which to retrieve current volume (if monthly or yearly will only use month or year component of date)

incrementCurrentVolume(bytes32,uint256,u.details: Add/update the current volume traded by key hash

params.keyHash: Key hash of the restricted thing to update current volume details
params.onDate: Specified date on which to update current volume (if monthly or yearly will only use month or year component of date)
params.volume: Value to change current trade volume to

maxVolumeByKey(bytes32).details: Retrieves a volume restriction by its id

params.keyHash: Key hash of the restricted thing to retrieve volume restriction details about

devdoc.title: Restricts trading by a set volume per period (daily, monthly, yearly)
